bibl.title: A Priestly Divorce in the Seventh Century Palestine. Various Legal Orders at Work .
Marriage: Ideal - Law - Practice. Proceedings of a Conference Held in Memory of Henryk Kupiszewski in Warsaw on the 24th of April 2004

series.title: The Case of P. Ness. III 57, a.

bibl.note: Part of a 2002 PhD thesis on divorce in Roman law and legal practice of Graeco-Roman Egypt, to be published as JJP Supplement. - I. Introduction. - II. Text [P. Nessana III, 57]. - III. The Legal Patchwork: 1. Reichsrecht Applied?; - 2. Church Law vs. Pastoral Practice; - 3. The Rise of Islam and the Local Customs. - IV. Mixing the Law.
